channel.title: ECMWF on Dr. Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in ECMWF on Dr. Dominic Royé

item.title: Access to climate reanalysis data from R
item.description: In this post, I will show how we can download and work directly with data from climatic reanalysis in R. These kind of datasets are combination of forcast models and data assimilation systems, which allows us to create corrected global grids of recent history of the atmosphere, land surface, and oceans.
